title: New Neil Young and Crazy Horse movie trailer reveals intense recording sessions | CBC Music
text:
Back in August, Canadian singer-songwriter Neil Young announced that he would be postponing his 2019 tour plans to focus on 15 new film projects. Today, Young has released the trailer for one of those documentaries.

Mountaintop is a behind-the-scenes look at the recording process for Colorado, Neil Young and Crazy Horse's first album in seven years, out Oct. 25. The film will hit select North American theatres for one night only on Oct. 22.

The trailer shows footage of the band performing in the studio, including some particularly tense moments where Young is seen frustrated and shouting. "I want it up as loud as it can go," he says at one point. "I want to hear the f--king thing."

Watch the trailer for Mountaintop below.
description: See how the rockers created their upcoming album, Colorado.
